skills.desc: Attacks 1 enemy. Has a 60% chance of placing a [Sleep] debuff for 1 turn. Has a 50% chance of granting an Extra Turn if the [Sleep] debuff is placed.
skills.name: Stupefy
skills.books:
Lvl. 2 Damage +5%
Lvl. 3 Damage +5%
Lvl. 4 Damage +5%
Lvl. 5 Buff/Debuff Chance +10%

skills.desc: Attacks 1 enemy. Places a [Stun] debuff for 1 turn. Places a [Stun] debuff for 2 turns if the target is under a [Sleep] debuff.
skills.name: Slobber Knocker
skills.books:
Lvl. 2 Damage +5%
Lvl. 3 Damage +5%
Lvl. 4 Damage +10%

skills.desc: Attacks 1 enemy. Enemies killed by this skill cannot be revived.
skills.name: And Stay Down
